answerText: Oscar and Lucinda[10] This author won the second of his two Booker prizes for his novel about the bushranger Ned Kelly titled A True History of the Kelly Gang. He earned his first Booker for Oscar and Lucinda.
heading: MUT |2012 | 1 | 2 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One of the title characters in this work destroys her precious doll in a failed attempt to fix the doll's hair. [10] Name this novel in which a woman meets a fellow gambler on a ship en route to New South Wales and tasks him with delivering a glass church to a small town through the Australian outback.
